results.description: Subscription has completely transformed the way we consume. For goods and services bought both episodically (computer software, electrical goods, etc.) and regularly (transport, on demand TV, music, contact lenses, etc.), more and more people now prefer to subscribe, as opposed to outright buy. And SlimPay, is the European leader for online payment for subscription. The company employs over 60 payment specialists spread over 6 international offices and more than 2000 customers (including Deezer…
